payment_mode.text: Mode through which payment is made. This can be check, cash, creditcard, banktransfer, bankremittance, autotransaction or others

amount.text: Amount paid in the respective payment

date.text: Date on which payment is made. Date Format [yyyy-mm-dd]

reference_number.text: Reference number generated for the payment. A string of your choice can also be used as the reference number

invoices.text: List of invoices associated with the payment. Each invoice object contains invoice_id, invoice_number, date, invoice_amount, amount_applied and balance_amount

exchange_rate.text: Exchange rate for the currency used in the invoices and customer's currency. The payment amount would be the multiplicative product of the original amount and the exchange rate

account_id.text: ID of the cash/ bank account the payment has to be deposited

tax_account_id.text: ID of the tax account, in case of withholding tax

customer_id.text: ID of the customer the invoice has to be created

invoice_number.text: An unique number given to the invoice. Maximum length [100]

reference_number.text: The reference number of the invoice

template_id.text: ID of the pdf template associated with the invoice

date.text: invoice date. Default date format is yyyy-mm-dd

payment_terms.text: Payment terms in days e.g. 15, 30, 60. Invoice due date will be calculated based on this

payment_terms_label.text: Used to override the default payment terms label

due_date.text: due date of the invoices. Default date format is yyyy-mm-dd.

discount.text: Discount applied to the invoice. It can be either in % or in amount. e.g. 12.5% or 190

is_discount_before_tax.text: Check if discount is exclusive of tax

is_inclusive_tax.text: To check if discount is inclusive of tax

exchange_rate.text: Exchange rate of the currency

recurring_invoice_id.text: ID of the recurring invoice from which the invoice is created

invoiced_estimate_id.text: ID of the invoice from which the invoice is created

custom_fields.text: Additional fields added to the invoice

project_id.text: Unique ID of the projet associated to an invoice

line_items.text: Line items of an invoice

allow_partial_payments.text: Boolean to check if partial payments are allowed for the contact

notes.text: The notes added below expressing gratitude or for conveying some information

terms.text: The terms added below expressing gratitude or for conveying some information

shipping_charge.text: Shipping charges applied to the invoice

adjustment_description.text: Customize the adjustment description. E.g. Rounding off

billing_address_id.text: Unique Id generated by the server for address in contacts page. To add a billing address to invoice, send the address_id using this node. Else, the default billing address for that contact is used

shipping_address_id.text: Unique Id generated by the server for address in contacts page. To add a shipping address to invoice, send the address_id using this node. Else, the default shipping address for that contact is used

gst_no.text: 15 digit GST identification number of the custome

gst_treatment.text: Choose whether the contact is GST registered/unregistered/consumer/overseas

place_of_supply.text: Place where the goods/services are supplied to. (If not given, place of contact given for the contact will be taken)

send.text: Send the invoice to the contact person(s) associated with the invoice. Allowed values true and false

ignore_auto_number_generation.text: Ignore auto invoice number generation for this invoice. This mandates the invoice number. Allowed values true and false
